Returns: one of the constants defined in this interface, indicating either the next step to perform, or success, or failure. 0 is for success, a negative value for failure.
Parameters: the currently established route, or null if nothing is established
nextStep(org.apache.http.conn.routing.Ro.FullName: public abstract int nextStep (RouteInfo plan, RouteInfo fact)

ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit Provides directions on establishing a route. Implementations of this interface compare a planned route with a tracked route and indicate the next step required.
